Sentence.string: Could you explain me why Marcus had a picture of you in his wallet ?
Well, we were close friends since our childhood, we were like brother and sister.

That’s confusing. I’ve found this collection of letters in which the person who wrote it was obviously a lady whose initials are R.C. and who seems deeply in love with Mr. Blayton as the phrase “Sweet love”, by which each letter ends, suggests it.
Panicked - Where did you find those letters ?
So you know they are real ...
Resigned - All right, those letters are from me. Marcus and I loved each other. I’ve always been attracted to this man. But our relation became really serious a couple of months ago.
Why did you hide it from me ?
Nobody was aware of this. We wanted to keep it secret in order to hurt less people as possible.
